title: Ticket #3324: Update URLs in yum repo files
description:
The yum repository files in /p/condor/public/html/yum/repo.d/*.repo should be updated to reflect the Condor -> HTCondor name change.

Specifically:

  • Each file should be renamed from condor-*.repo to htcondor-*.repo. Symlinks from the old names to the new names should be created for backward compatibility.
  • The repository identifier in each file should be changed from condor-* to htcondor-*
  • The word Condor in the repository description ("name" field in the .repo file) should be replaced with HTCondor
  • The baseurl should be changed from "http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/yum/*" to "http://research.cs.wisc.edu/htcondor/yum/*"

Also, the webpage at /p/condor/public/html/yum/index.html should be updated to refer to the new filenames.

Before I do this, I must verify that no conflicts happen from duplicate entries -- that is, no errors will result from a user having both the old repo definition file and the new repo definition file.
remarks:
2012-Nov-15 16:32:02 by matyas:
I have verified that having the old and the new .repo file side-by-side causes no conflicts on either EL5 or EL6.

2012-Nov-15 16:43:18 by matyas:
This is done. I have also updated the .htaccess file in the yum/repo.d directory: it used to restrict access to condor-testing-*.repo to wisc.edu domains; now it also restricts access to htcondor-testing-*.repo.
